name: unSYSTEM
description: [unSYSTEM](http://unsystem.net/) is a collective dedicated to creating popular tools that promote privacy, independence, and integrity in contradistinction to those used for mass surveillance and suppression.  Software projects include [Libbitcoin](https://libbitcoin.dyne.org/), [SX](https://sx.dyne.org/), and [Lorea](#Lorea).
